data.name: SectionDescription
data.value: Quick answers for easy orientation. Click to reveal more details.

data.name: FaqQuestion1
data.value: How fast can we run our first internal audit?

data.name: FaqAnswer1
data.value: We typically recommend a pilot audit within 30 days of starting our cooperation. We will provide prepared checklists and mentoring for your audit team.

data.name: FaqAnswer2
data.value: No. Most clients begin with a simple shared drive and spreadsheets. If you need a more advanced solution, we will help you select and implement it.

data.name: FaqQuestion3
data.value: What if we lack internal capacity?

data.name: FaqAnswer3
data.value: We can set up the processes together at the beginning and gradually hand them over to your team. We also offer long-term oversight and mentoring until you are confident running the system yourselves.
